name: winwyv_levelup_01
text: Ah, I haven't felt this young in a dragon's age.
text_simple: ah i havent felt this young in a dragons age

name: winwyv_levelup_02
text: By the sweep of my wings, that feels good!
text_simple: by the sweep of my wings that feels good

name: winwyv_levelup_03
text: My old wings beat with youthful strength!
text_simple: my old wings beat with youthful strength

name: winwyv_levelup_04
text: What wyvern can resist such power!
text_simple: what wyvern can resist such power

name: winwyv_levelup_06
text: A coldness grows in my breast. Delicious!
text_simple: a coldness grows in my breast delicious

name: winwyv_levelup_07
text: I've not felt this fresh since I sprang from the egg!
text_simple: ive not felt this fresh since i sprang from the egg

name: winwyv_levelup_08
text: Ah, I've never felt this good! Ah ha ha ha ha!

name: winwyv_kill_03

name: winwyv_kill_05
text: You let my cold wings shadow you.
text_simple: you let my cold wings shadow you

name: winwyv_kill_06
text: I was wise to you all along.
text_simple: i was wise to you all along

name: winwyv_kill_07
text: A wyvern's wisdom is not to be questioned.
text_simple: a wyverns wisdom is not to be questioned

name: winwyv_kill_10
text: You'll never touch my treasure now.
text_simple: youll never touch my treasure now

name: winwyv_rival_01
text: You're the ice cold wind beneath my wings.
text_simple: youre the ice cold wind beneath my wings

name: winwyv_rival_02
text: He had a bad case of the vapors.
text_simple: he had a bad case of the vapors

name: winwyv_rival_05
text: I knew Slyrak, Dragon Knight. You're no Slyrak.
text_simple: i knew slyrak dragon knight youre no slyrak

name: winwyv_rival_06
text: All your dragons came home to roost.
text_simple: all your dragons came home to roost

name: winwyv_rival_07
text: These are unfriendly skies for a viper.
text_simple: these are unfriendly skies for a viper

name: winwyv_rival_09
text: Ah ha! That was unequal combat.
text_simple: ah ha that was unequal combat

name: winwyv_rival_10
text: I should have crushed you in the nest.
text_simple: i should have crushed you in the nest

name: winwyv_rival_11
text: I'm an Eldwurm now, but I was once a Maidenwurm.
text_simple: im an eldwurm now but i was once a maidenwurm

name: winwyv_rival_12
text: I thought would Io would add a nice glimmer to my hoard.
text_simple: i thought would io would add a nice glimmer to my hoard

name: winwyv_rival_13
text: Lina, I don't find you hot at all.
text_simple: lina i dont find you hot at all

name: winwyv_rival_17
text: That'll teach you to hunt dragons.
text_simple: thatll teach you to hunt dragons

name: winwyv_rival_18
text: You only wear your wings when none can see them!
text_simple: you only wear your wings when none can see them

name: winwyv_rival_19
text: Was that ice you were shooting? I hardly noticed.
text_simple: was that ice you were shooting i hardly noticed
